column9: Located in the university area right next to the Lund Cathedral, this green lung in the heart of Lund feels extremely peaceful and relaxing, even during winter when snow covers the ground. It’s a truly lovely feeling just strolling through the park in this slow-paced...More

column7: Lovely green area in the middle of Lund
column9: In a university city like Lund, nice green area to take a break from the city buildings and stroll through this little well kept park.

A lovely oasis of greenery just beside the majestic Lund cathedral and the old university buildings. It is quiet, but with the frequent passing of pedestrians it can be an excellent place for people-watching on a good-weather day.
RIght near Lund Cathedral.  A beautiful peaceful park.  Sat here for a bit reflecting... taking it all in.   So peaceful even though surrounded by a city.

column7: Nice oasis in the centre of the city
column9: Inbetween the very important buildings in the centre of Lund you ll fine this little green park. Nice place to sit during sunny days and one of the most wellknown places in Lund
I love to walk around here in the different seasons and around the historical buildings. It is a nice oasis in the middle to the city. A beautiful place to wonder, or to sit and relax

You can't miss this piece of Lund. Impressive buildings and a nice green oasis in the middle and very center of Lund. I love to walk through Lundagård and just be. Winter, spring, summer or fall it is always beautiful and it has a certain...More
Fine place to digest your food from the many restaurants near it - a real oases. My wife and I have sat many an hour there.

We walked through the park en route to Lund cathedral. It was a wet and early morning so the view is very different from those of the other photos here. But it's a different feeling and I enjoyed the cold and freezing walk.
There is nothing special about the park. You can bike through it or walk through it. You can sit down and have a picnic even.

Lundagård is a uique park as it was once surronded by walls and only was open to the students of the University. It is still in the heart of academic Lund, surrounded by the Univertsity, the Academic Association and the Cathedral. Don't miss the Unicersity...More
Small but great for a walk around. Lund is small in general so it is not far from anything and close to the main university building and cathedral.

column7: A nice stroll in between historical buildings.
column9: Nicely located in between Domkyrkan, the university building and Kulturen. Nice little park for a relaxing walk.

column7: Nice garden among the main attractions
column9: Lundagård is a garden that sits right between the University, the Historic Museum and the Cathedral. Well kept, with paths where you can walk with no hurry. A great starting point to walk around Lund.
Mitt i det vackra Lund finns denna park. Underbart att strosa omkring i, och känna den avslappnade stämningen.
Det lundabesök finns inte som inte innefattar en promenad i Lunds mest anrika park. Ett måste helt enkelt.

column7: En unik historisk plats i Sverige

Även som icke-student är Lundagård en trevlig miljö att promenera igenom. Speciellt vårtid, eller då hösten gjort sin entré.
